resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107109</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107109</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087652</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">iCommons iSummit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">iCommons iSummit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">iSummit d'iCommons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">iSummit dos iCommons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">iSummit dei iCommons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">iCommons iSummit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">iSummit de los iCommons</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Leaders of the Creative Commons, free software, open education and access to knowledge communities talk about their vision for the future and discuss strategies for building a free global culture that is rich - both in terms of economic viability and geographic diversity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führer der kreativen Common, der freien Software,
der geöffneten Ausbildung und des Zugriffs zu den Wissen 
Gemeinschaften befassen sich mit ihrem Anblick während der Zukunft 
und behandeln Strategien für das Aufbauen einer freien globalen 
Kultur, die reich ist - beide in ökonomischer Entwicklungsfähigkeit 
und geographischer Verschiedenartigkeit ausgedrückt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les amorces des terrains communaux créateurs, du 
logiciel libre, de l'éducation ouverte et de l'accès aux 
communautés de la connaissance parlent de leur vision à l'avenir et 
discutent des stratégies pour établir une culture globale libre qui 
est riche - tous les deux en termes de viabilité économique et 
diversité géographique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os líderes das terras comuns creativas, do 
software livre, da instrução aberta e do acesso às comunidades do 
conhecimento falam sobre sua visão para o futuro e discutem 
estratégias para construir uma cultura global livre que seja rica - 
ambos nos termos do viability econômico e da diversidade geográfica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I capi dei terreni comunali creativi, del 
software libero, della formazione aperta e dell'accesso alle Comunità
di conoscenza parlano della loro visione per il futuro e discutono le 
strategie per lo sviluppo della coltura globale libera che è ricca - 
entrambi in termini di attuabilità economica e diversità geografica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ηγέτες των δημιουργικών αστικών τάξεων, του 
ελεύθερου λογισμικού, της ανοικτών εκπαίδευσης και της πρόσβασης 
στις κοινότητες γνώσης μιλούν για το όραμά τους για το μέλλον 
και συζητούν τις στρατηγικές για έναν ελεύθερο σφαιρικό 
πολιτισμό που είναι πλούσιος - και από την άποψη της οικονομικής
βιωσιμότητας και της γεωγραφικής ποικιλομορφίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los arranques de cinta de los campos comunes 
creativos, del software libre, de la educación abierta y del acceso a
las comunidades del conocimiento hablan de su visión para el futuro y
discuten las estrategias para construir una cultura global libre que 
sea rica - ambos en términos de la viabilidad económica y de la 
diversidad geográfica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087652</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107109</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/icommons-isummit</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
